_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è DO NOT commit this file with real values! Add to .gitignore
_instructions:
1. Copy this file: cp secrets.example.json secrets.json
2. Fill in real values
3. Run: pwsh scripts/add-github-secrets.ps1 -SecretsFile secrets.json
_STAGING_DATABASE_URL_help: Get from: Railway.app or Vercel Postgres ‚Üí Staging environment
_PRODUCTION_DATABASE_URL_help: Get from: Railway.app or Vercel Postgres ‚Üí Production environment
_VERCEL_ORG_ID_help: Run 'vercel link' in odavl-studio/insight/cloud/, then check .vercel/project.json
_VERCEL_PROJECT_ID_help: Same as above - check .vercel/project.json after 'vercel link'
_SNYK_TOKEN_help: Get from: https://app.snyk.io/account ‚Üí Auth Token section
_CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN_help: [OPTIONAL] Create token with Workers + Cache permissions
_CLOUDFLARE_ZONE_ID_help: [OPTIONAL] From domain Overview page ‚Üí API section
_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID_help: [OPTIONAL] From AWS IAM Console ‚Üí Create user with S3 access
_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_help: [OPTIONAL] From AWS IAM Console (shown only once!)
_AZURE_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING_help: [OPTIONAL] From Azure Portal ‚Üí Storage Account ‚Üí Access keys
_GITLEAKS_LICENSE_help: [OPTIONAL] From https://gitleaks.io/ (works without in free mode)
